name: Rebuild (itch) (Mossyart)
description:
Rebuild is a gritty 2D Sidescroller atmospheric Horrorthat takes you through a broken, fragmented mind, and has you physically rebuild the character while gaining back memories and fleshing out the world.

 Playing as Casey you wake up lost, in a dark cold place unknown to you, Can Casey dicover who they are? and find a way out of this place while defeating the monsters that inhabit his head.

THIS IS A VERY SHORT PROTOTYPE - FINAL PROJECT NUA 2022 - KYLE WILLACEY
